name: Symphony of Stars
description: This is space combat with a twist. Choose a faction to fight for, colonize and defend planets for it, while also leading the attack against your rivals.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i7 - 4710HQ CPU @ 2.50GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 860M (GTX 970 or above required for VR) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
